whiteboard.student

Class StudentController

  • java.lang.Object
    • whiteboard.student.StudentController

  • @Controller
public class StudentController
extends java.lang.Object
    A controller for students. A student views lectures, they take attendance, view the seating chart and Submit assignment and view grades
    Author:
    Mireille Mwiza Iradukunda

public java.lang.String stud_home_get(@CookieValue(value="person")
                                                                                  java.lang.String person,
                                                                                  org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This function gets mapping from student home. It shows the courses that the student is currently enrolled in.

        person: - person object
        model: - to add attributes to view

public java.lang.String stud_home_post(@ModelAttribute
                                                                                    Person person,
                                                                                    @RequestParam(value="c_enrolled")
                                                                                    java.lang.String enroll_course,
                                                                                    org.springframework.ui.Model model)

      • course_page_get

        @GetMapping(value="/student/course_page")
public java.lang.String course_page_get(org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This function gets mapping from course page. It gets the list of lectures by using the student id and the course code that he/she is enrolled in. Then it will attach the lecture list to the view.
        Parameters:
        model -
        Returns:
        student/course_page

      • view_lecture_post

        @PostMapping(value="/student/view_lecture")
public java.lang.String view_lecture_post(@ModelAttribute
                                                                                       Person person,
                                                                                       @RequestParam(value="attendance")
                                                                                       java.lang.String attendance,
                                                                                       org.springframework.ui.Model model)
        This function posts mapping from student view lecture page. If the student clicks on one of the course code that he/she would like to view, it will prompt him/her to the lecture page where they can view seating chart, take attendance, and the grades.
        Parameters:
        person -
        view_lecture -
        model -
        Returns:
        student/view_lecture
